item.title: Entrepreneurial AI student stars in Bright SCIdea Challenge with mental health chatbot

The Lombard effect and how we could use it to help with hearing impairment
item.description: Have you ever wondered why we tend to speak louder in a noisy room? Well, speech and linguistic researchers have been curious too, and they’ve explored a concept called the Lombard Effect (discovered by Ã‰tienne Lombard). ðŸ”Š The Lombard Effect in a Nutshell Picture yourself at a party, where the music is playing and everyone is chatting and laughing. Having a good time! To make yourself heard by your friend, your brain automatically level up your voice’s volume, tweaks your pitch and even adjust your speech speed.
